00020 /*****************************************************************************
00021 
00022   sc_bigint.h -- Template version of sc_signed. This class enables
00023                  compile-time bit widths for sc_signed numbers.
00024 
00025   Original Author: Ali Dasdan, Synopsys, Inc.

00027  *****************************************************************************/

00076 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00077 //  CLASS TEMPLATE : sc_bigint<W>
00078 //
00079 //  Arbitrary size signed integer type.
00080 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00081 
00082 #ifdef SC_MAX_NBITS
00083 template< int W = SC_MAX_NBITS >
00084 #else
00085 template< int W >
00086 #endif
00087 class sc_bigint
00088     : public sc_signed
00089 {
00090 public:
00091 
00092     // constructors
00093 
00094     sc_bigint()
00095         : sc_signed( W )
00096         {}
00097 
00098     sc_bigint( const sc_bigint<W>& v )
00099         : sc_signed( W )
00100         { *this = v; }
00101 
00102     sc_bigint( const sc_signed& v )
00103         : sc_signed( W )
00104         { *this = v; }
00105 
00106     sc_bigint( const sc_signed_subref& v )
00107         : sc_signed( W )
00108         { *this = v; }
00109 
00110     template< class T >
00111     sc_bigint( const sc_generic_base<T>& a )
00112         : sc_signed( W )
00113         { a->to_sc_signed(*this); }
00114 
00115     sc_bigint( const sc_unsigned& v )
00116         : sc_signed( W )
00117         { *this = v; }
00118 
00119     sc_bigint( const sc_unsigned_subref& v )
00120         : sc_signed( W )
00121         { *this = v; }
00122

00124         : sc_signed( W )
00125         { *this = v; }
00126

00128         : sc_signed( W )
00129         { *this = v; }
00130

00132         : sc_signed( W )
00133         { *this = v; }
00134

00196         { sc_signed::operator = ( v ); return *this; }

00206         { a->to_sc_signed(*this); return *this;}
